document.full_text: bp plc has agreed to provide $1 billion toward initial projects in the gulf of mexico to address damage to natural resources from last year's oil spill, the u.s. justice department said on thursday.
document.title: bp to provide $1 billion for oil spill projects
lines_and_colors: bp plc has agreed to provide $1 billion toward initial projects in the gulf of mexico to address damage to natural resources from last year's oil spill, the u.s. justice department said on thursday.
